titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the Cathedral Church in Gloucester, upon St. Georges Day on which day His most sacred Majesty Charles the Second, was most solemnly crowned / by Tomas Carles ...
titleStmt.author: Carles, Thomas, 1625 or 6-1675.
